assignments.name: Update_Original_Contract_From_Active_Input_Contract
assignments.label: Update Original Contract From Active Input Contract

assignments.name: Update_Total_Non_Auto_Renewal_Contracts
assignments.label: Update Total Non Auto Renewal Contracts

assignments.name: Update_Total_Number_of_Active_Contracts
assignments.label: Update Total Number of Active Contracts

Flow.description:
DO NOT REMOVE: This flow cannot be used as action due to text input parameter. Only use it as detail or list button as sub-flow.
06-10-2025: Renjith updated changes from 869aqbwrm

formulas.name: AddRemoveProductLabel
formulas.expression: IF({!Contract_sObject} || {!Opportunity_sObject}, 'Add/Remove product or change rooms', 'Add/Remove product or change rooms to existing contract')

formulas.name: RenewContractLabel
formulas.expression: IF({!Account_sObject}, 'Renew an active contract', 'Renew this contract')

Flow.label: Create New Opportunity

fields.name: SuccessMessage
fields.fieldText: Your new Opportunity is ready. Click "Open Opportunity" to continue.

fields.name: ErrorScreenHeader
fields.fieldText: We Hit a Snag

fields.name: Unsupported_sObject_Message
fields.fieldText: • E501: This operation is not supported{!E501MessageBodyObjectName} at the moment.

fields.name: No_Active_Contract_Message
fields.fieldText: • E404: Cannot add or remove products — no active contracts found.

fields.name: InvalidProcessTypeError
fields.fieldText: • E400: Bad Request, we couldn’t identify the process type. Please reach out to your system admin.

fields.name: ExistingOpenOpportunityMessage
fields.fieldText: An open opportunity exist for this account. Please click open opportunity button to view the opportunity.

fields.name: NonAutoRenewalMissingMessage
fields.fieldText: No relevant contracts found for renewal. Please click next to create a new opportunity.

fields.name: What_action_do_you_want_to_do
fields.fieldText: What action do you want to do?

fields.name: What_action_do_you_want_to_do_on_contract
fields.fieldText: What action do you want to do?

value.formulaExpression: CASE({!InputProcessType}, {!Monthly_Opportunity}, NULL, {!Product_Update}, {!OriginalContract.EndDate}, DATE( YEAR({!OriginalContract.EndDate}) + FLOOR((MONTH({!OriginalContract.EndDate}) + ((YEAR({!OriginalContract.EndDate}) - YEAR({!OriginalContract.StartDate})) * 12 + (MONTH({!OriginalContract.EndDate}) - MONTH({!OriginalContract.StartDate})) + 1)) / 12), MOD((MONTH({!OriginalContract.EndDate}) + ((YEAR({!OriginalContract.EndDate}) - YEAR({!OriginalContract.StartDate})) * 12 + (MONTH({!OriginalContract.EndDate}) - MONTH({!OriginalContract.StartDate})) + 1)) - 1, 12) + 1, CASE( MOD((MONTH({!OriginalContract.EndDate}) + ((YEAR({!OriginalContract.EndDate}) - YEAR({!OriginalContract.StartDate})) * 12 + (MONTH({!OriginalContract.EndDate}) - MONTH({!OriginalContract.StartDate})) + 1)) - 1, 12) + 1, 1, 31, 2, IF( MOD( YEAR({!OriginalContract.EndDate}) + FLOOR((MONTH({!OriginalContract.EndDate}) + ((YEAR({!OriginalContract.EndDate}) - YEAR({!OriginalContract.StartDate})) * 12 + (MONTH({!OriginalContract.EndDate}) - MONTH({!OriginalContract.StartDate})) + 1)) / 12), 4) = 0 && (MOD( YEAR({!OriginalContract.EndDate}) + FLOOR((MONTH({!OriginalContract.EndDate}) + ((YEAR({!OriginalContract.EndDate}) - YEAR({!OriginalContract.StartDate})) * 12 + (MONTH({!OriginalContract.EndDate}) - MONTH({!OriginalContract.StartDate})) + 1)) / 12), 100) <> 0 || MOD( YEAR({!OriginalContract.EndDate}) + FLOOR((MONTH({!OriginalContract.EndDate}) + ((YEAR({!OriginalContract.EndDate}) - YEAR({!OriginalContract.StartDate})) * 12 + (MONTH({!OriginalContract.EndDate}) - MONTH({!OriginalContract.StartDate})) + 1)) / 12), 400) = 0), 29, 28 ), 3, 31, 4, 30, 5, 31, 6, 30, 7, 31, 8, 31, 9, 30, 10,31, 11,30, 12,31, 31 ) ) )
